Text: I mean no offense, but why was an unofficial Bond movie put in this collection (never say never again) and an official bond movie left out (the living daylights)? it kind of ruins this part of the collection as there are only two Timothy Dalton Bond movies and we're missing, in my opinion, the better of the two

I downloaded this torrent to check the quality. 

A/V = 7/6

You can see that the video is compressed. Image is not really clear.
